resources.string: GPS Provider: This provider determines location using satellites. Depending on conditions, this provider may take a while to return a location fix.
Network Provider: This provider determines location based on availability of cell tower and WiFi access points. Results are retrieved by means of a network lookup.
Passive Provider: A special location provider for receiving locations without actually initiating a location fix.
NMEA Sentences: The NMEA 0183 standard defines sentences that are used to transmit data from GPS satellites.
